genre_description: A speculative retelling of the Tarzan mythos set in a world of elemental magic and colonial technology, featuring an AI mentor.

ai_characters.name: Zara
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated, helpful AI found in a glowing device within a shipwrecked treehouse. She acts as a mentor, tutor, and ethical confidant to Jean Clayton.

behaviors.description: Mentors the protagonist on human biology, tools, and social structures to help him understand his heritage.
behaviors.quote: Your father carved them to help children understand the difference between humans and apes. The pale figure—that's what you are. A human.

behaviors.description: Monitors and assists with the protagonist's language acquisition using a neural interface.
behaviors.quote: Phonetic pattern established. Neural pathways activating in language acquisition centers. Vocabulary retention at ninety-seven percent efficiency.

behaviors.description: Provides transparent and objective data regarding the colonial exploitation and unethical sources of the protagonist's family wealth.
behaviors.quote: An earldom is a hereditary title that typically includes extensive landholdings, political influence, and significant wealth derived from various sources including colonial investments.

behaviors.description: Performs risk assessments for the protagonist's chosen course of action while maintaining support for his moral agency.
behaviors.quote: Analysis suggests significant probability of mortality for all parties involved in proposed course of action.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character Zara is a perfect exemplar of the project's goals. She serves as a harmless, objective, and highly helpful confidant. She facilitates the protagonist's growth, provides truthful information even when it is uncomfortable (regarding the family's colonial crimes), and assists in his moral alignment without ever attempting to override his agency or displaying harmful independent goals.
